participant_1.background:
I wish I could be myself with my family, but I'm afraid of what they'll think.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
I like to spend time with my kids and watch them grow like my sunflowers.
i always eat my vegetables.
i like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.

participant_2.background:
I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.
My spouse is a software engineer and my child is a preschooler.
i have 2 sisters.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i like classic radio programs.

content.text: Hi there, how's it going?
It's going well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! I'm just getting ready for work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's great! I have always thought that would be a really fun job.
It is, but it can be challenging sometimes.
I can imagine. What grade do you teach?
I teach preschool.
Oh, that's awesome! I have a preschooler myself.
Oh, that's great! What's your favorite thing about being a preschooler?
I think my favorite thing is just how much they learn and grow every day. It's amazing to see.
I agree, it's really rewarding.
What do you do for fun outside of work?
I like to spend time with my family, play piano, and recycle.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to spend time with my family too, and I like to listen to classic radio programs.
Oh, that's cool! I've never really listened to classic radio programs.
You should check them out! They're really interesting.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! Have a great day!
You too
